Signatures

Modules

  • Args Handles command line arguments parsing
  • Branch Handles branching - creating a branch, synchronizing refs with HEAD
  • Checkout Checkouts commit with specified hash to working directory.
  • Commit Commits currently staged files with specified message or loads/stores commit data.
  • Diff Exports functions to diff and merge files.
  • Hashing Exports functions for hashing with SHA1
  • Index Manages index(staging area) - adds/removes items
  • Init Initializes hagit repository in working directory
  • Log Prints log - list of all commits of the repository in working directory
  • Main Entry point module
  • Status Prints out the status of files - newmodifieddeleted files in working directorystaging areanewest commit
  • Utils Utility functions - mostly directories handling.

Produced by Haddock version 2.18.1
